name: OpenWrt 23.05
install_guide_markdown:
# OpenWrt Installation Guide

OpenWrt installation varies by hardware. For x86_64, image should be written directly to disk.

install_steps.title: Download Image
install_steps.detail_md: Download OpenWrt 23.05 image for your hardware target (x86_64 or router model).

install_steps.title: Decompress Image
install_steps.detail_md: Extract .img.gz file using gzip or equivalent tool.

install_steps.title: Write Image to Device
install_steps.detail_md: Use dd, Etcher, or equivalent to write image to USB or target storage (device OR router flash via web UI).

install_steps.title: Boot OpenWrt
install_steps.detail_md: For x86_64, boot from installed media. For routers, power cycle and wait for boot.

install_steps.title: Initial Configuration
install_steps.detail_md: Access LuCI web interface at 192.168.1.1, set root password and network settings.

license: GPL and other open source licenses
privacy_notes: OpenWrt respects user privacy. Self-hosted, no external telemetry by default.
